name: TAPSONIC BOLD - Original Sound Track
detailed_description:
Track List

  • 01. Laurent Newfield - I'M ALIVE
  • 02. NieN - Let's Burn
  • 03. Dashorn - Emoji Love
  • 04. Messier - FIGHT NIGHT (feat. Calyae)
  • 05. MYUKKE. - GAI∀PEX
  • 06. ARForest x Soochan - 神憑り
  • 07. Roy Mikelate - Ladies in tha House
  • 08. ND Lee - DO IT !
  • 09. Paul Bazooka - Ghost In the Machine
  • 10. Sampling Masters MEGA - Pharm of Charm
  • 11. LeeZu - This is you
  • 12. Mr.Funky - Fogo
  • 13. NieN - Save Me
  • 14. Makou - Jellyfish
  • 15. Cuve - IRIDESCNT
  • 16. XeoN - Happiness Of Darkness
  • 17. Cranky - BLACK GOLD
  • 18. HAYAKO - BlueWhite
  • 19. GOTH - BOLD INFILTRATION

You'll find the OST in your Steam local files folder:
Steam\steamapps\common\TAPSONIC BOLD\OST

supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 3.0GHz AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+ 3.0GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 700 Series or AMD RX200 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
